scenario.name: Send REGISTER to Invitee
scenario.sendRequestSIP: REGISTER sip:[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: sip:[invitee]@[domainName] From: "[invitee]" <sip:[invitee]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Call-ID:[newCallId] Expires:0 CSeq: [newCseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [ipAddressSip]:[portSip];branch=[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] Contact: sip:[invitee]@[ipAddressSip]:[portSip] Content-Length: 0
